name: eyetooth
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
either of the two pointed teeth that are found one on each side of the top of the mouth: He grinned, flashing sharp eyeteeth. Synonym
canine (TOOTH)
Yuri_Arcurs/E+/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesHe had a gold eyetooth.The orthodontist fitted her with an appliance to create space for her eyeteeth by moving her molars back.She had surgery to remove an impacted eye tooth in the roof of her mouth.A dress could be decorated with eyeteeth taken from hunted animals.
